## Checklist

Before submitting this PR, please make sure:

- [ ] My code follows the [naming convention](../CONTRIBUTING.md#-file-naming-convention-0000_filename) (`0000_filename`)
- [ ] I have placed my file(s) in the correct language folder
- [ ] My code is well-commented and follows best practices
- [ ] I have tested my code and it runs without errors
- [ ] I have verified the output is correct
- [ ] My solution handles edge cases appropriately
- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guide
- [ ] I have checked there are no similar PRs already open
- [ ] My code doesn't introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have updated documentation if necessary
